description.oldValue:
,An administrator will have the ability to downsize a user's Cloud PC, provided that the admin has licenses in inventory to perform the downgrade. Only available for direct assigned licenses. Downsizing is only supported for vCPU/RAM – not storage.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: September CY2022
description.newValue: ,An administrator will have the ability to downsize a user's Cloud PC, provided that the admin has licenses in inventory to perform the downgrade. Only available for direct assigned licenses. Downsizing is only supported for vCPU/RAM – not storage.
